question: Who has been named as the ICC Male Cricketer of the Decade and ODI Cricketer of the Decade?
explanation:
Indian Cricket Team skipper Virat Kohli was announced the winner of two awards by the International Cricket Council namely the ICC ODI Men’s Cricketer of the Decade and ICC Male Cricketer of the Decade.
Former Captain MS Dhoni won the ICC Spirit of Cricket Award of the Decade. During the ICC’s qualification period, Virat Kohli has hit more than 20000 runs at an average of 56.97. He has also scored 66 hundreds and 94 fifties during the period.
